Sprinkle strawberries with sugar and let stand 10 min. Fold marshmal- lows and sour cream into strawberry mixture. Add salt and mix gently. Place in a covered container and store in refrigerator overnight. To serve, spoon into individual serving dishes; garnish with a whole strawberry. NOTE: Cool Whip may be substituted for sour cream.
